name: Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren Gaiden - Onna Kenshi Asuka Kenzan!
name_original: Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren Gaiden - Onna Kenshi Asuka Kenzan!
description: Fushigi no Dungeon: Furai no Shiren Gaiden - Onna Kenshi Asuka Kenzan! for Windows is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by ChunSoft, which was released in Japan in 2002.
